item.title: Certbot
item.description: my certificate is expired and certbot This gives me a message “your current client, does not support ACME v2 at all. You will need to migrate to a different one”, but there is nothing I can do to update my certbot. So I did some googling around, and found nothing that helped me. It is worth to note that this was in an old server with ubuntu 17. Now there is one thing I can do: remove it and install it again!
